title: What is Mesmerismus and how does it relate to our internal processes, emotions, and symbols?
first_phrase: In this final part (200 tokens) of the text, the author explores the power of symbols in accessing higher states of consciousness and being. The Mesmerismus® approach is highlighted as a way to tap into the natural elements that aid physical and psychological functioning. The author explains how the use of symbols can help individuals connect with their intuition and the non-intellectual parts of their mind. The text also discusses the importance of accessing and vivifying the energy of life as a means to achieving personal evolution. Overall, the text conveys how embracing natural elements and utilizing symbolism can lead to a more balanced and fulfilling life.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the practice of generating coherence through rhythm in the brain and body is a powerful tool, as seen in the exceptional results achieved through Mesmerismus. By working on all elements together, the most powerful magnetism can be obtained. The key to accessing and vivifying the vital energy lies in accessing our internal source of power and increasing our awareness to develop control and power over ourselves. The final stage is to vivify and exalt this inner self, which leads to a spring of the soul. The ancient symbols used represent different depths of the soul, and their meanings can be experienced through direct practice. With this knowledge and the potentiation of our senses, we can transcend the frozen nature of the ordinary human state and become a radiating cloud, with the will to guide our actions.
